info.name: Conduit
info.description:
Collection for testing the Conduit API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

exec: tests['Global variable "token" has been set'] = pm.globals.get('token') === user.token;

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.createdAt);
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.updatedAt);

tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.createdAt);
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.updatedAt);
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests['An article was returned'] = article !== undefined;
tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.createdAt);
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.updatedAt);
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests['The first tag is dragons'] = article.tagList[0] === 'dragons';
tests['The second tag is training'] = article.tagList[1] === 'training';
tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.createdAt);
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.updatedAt);

tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.createdAt);
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.updatedAt);
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests["Article's 'favorited' property is true"] = article.favorited === true;
tests["Article's 'favoritesCount' property is greater than 0"] = article.favoritesCount > 0;
tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.createdAt);
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = is_iso8601(article.updatedAt);
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
